org.apache.flink.api.common.operators

Interface RecordOperator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoGroupOperator, CrossOperator, CrossWithLargeOperator, CrossWithSmallOperator, JoinOperator, MapOperator, MapPartitionOperator, NoOpBinaryUdfOp, NoOpUnaryUdfOp, ReduceOperator

    public interface RecordOperator
    Interface marking operators to be referring to the Record data model.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Class<? extends Key<?>>[] getKeyClasses()
      Gets the key classes that this operator works on.
